# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5) 

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of 
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of 
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### Belt group at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of 
-  Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
-  Ensure that burner mining drills, furnaces, and boilers have a sufficient fuel supply to operate.
-  Regularly check the status of these entities to prevent downtime.

### Errors when entities are not connected
-  Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power source, such as a boiler, to function correctly.
-  Verify that pipe groups are properly connected to facilitate fluid flow.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
-  Ensure that electricity-generating entities, such as steam engines, are plugged into the electric network to supply power.
-  Verify that the electric network is properly configured to distribute power to all connected entities.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients or source items
-  Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to produce items.
-  Verify that burner inserters have a source of items to insert into furnaces or other entities.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
